name: GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL DISTRICT, Respondent, v. GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL PERSONNEL ASSOCIATION (PSEA/NEA), Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Greater Johnstown School District v. Greater Johnstown School Personnel Ass'n

parties: GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL DISTRICT, Respondent, v. GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL PERSONNEL ASSOCIATION (PSEA/NEA), Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of November, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby REVERSED. Office of Attorney General v. Council 13, AFSCME, AFL-CIO, 577 Pa. 257, 844 A.2d 1217 (2004).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 950
GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL DISTRICT, Respondent, v. GREATER JOHNSTOWN SCHOOL PERSONNEL ASSOCIATION (PSEA/NEA), Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 24, 2004.
